title: SF_EDM (FunctionBlock)
text:
FUNCTION_BLOCK SF_EDM
External device monitoring â The Function block controls a safety output and monitors controlled actuators, e.g. subsequent contactors.
Function block according to PLCopen, Technical Committee 5: Safety Software (Technical Specification), Part 1: Concepts and Function Blocks, Version 2.01 (2020-2)

rows: Control signal of the preceeding safety FBs.
Feedback signal of the first connected actuator.
Feedback signal of the second connected actuator.

Maximum response time of the connected and monitored
actuators.

rows.Name: Ready
rows.Comment:
Activation of the FB. TRUE indicates that the FB is
activated and the outputs results are valid, FALSE the FB is
not active and the program is not executed.

rows:
Controls the actuator. The result is monitored by the feed-
back signal EDMx.

Output indicating that the FB is active and the primary
safety function is demanded (e.g. related to the safety
functionality).

Output which can be used to signal the operator to press the
reset functionality to continue.
